attributes.action: Block the award of a CBE to Mark Carne of Network Rail
attributes.background: To give a CBE to the person responsible for the recent timetable chaos is not only inappropriate but calls into question the validity of the whole Honours system.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here: 

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/having-honours-taken-away-forfeiture
